Do we control our destiny or unseen forces manipulating us? In the thriller 'The Adjustment Bureau ", Matt Damon plays a man who discovers the future that fate has reserved and is not satisfied. To achieve change, you should pursue, by and under the streets of New York today, the woman he loves. 

David Norris (Matt Damon) is an ambitious politician about to get a seat in the U.S. Senate when he meets the beautiful contemporary dancer Sellas Elise (Emily Blunt), a woman totally unlike any you've known so now. He soon realized that falling in love with Elise, but a few mysterious characters do their best to separate them from each other. 

David understands that faces the agents of fate, the men of "Adjustment Bureau" (Office Settings). Willing to use the considerable power they have to keep David and Elise join. Seemingly has everything going against and he has no choice but to choose from: let go and accept the predestined path ... or risk everything and face the Destination to be with her.
